summary: The MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation and blogs with AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics. It leverages MkDocs hooks to provide features like AI-generated summaries, multi-language support, smart content cleaning, and efficient caching. It also offers intelligent reading statistics with precise Chinese character counting, code detection, and estimated reading time. The system supports automatic language recognition, content type detection, cache optimization, error handling, and customizable API services. The project aims to streamline content creation and enhance user experience through advanced technical features and planned functionalities.
